history:
/circle6 Ask about the number of previous pregnancies. Confi  rm whether they were all live 
births, and if there was any stillbirth, abortion or any child who died.
/circle6 Ascertain the date and outcome of each event, along with the birth weight, if known. It is 
especially important to know about the last pregnancy. Find out if there was any adverse 
perinatal (period between 7 days before birth and 28 days aft er birth) outcome. 
/circle6 Obtain information about any obstetric comp
